title: OnePlus Nord N20 teaser shows off new design, confirms 60Hz AMOLED display and April launch
content:
The budget-focused Nord series from OnePlus is about to pick up another sequel, this time in the OnePlus Nord N20, which is officially kicking off its teaser cycle.

moreâ€¦

The post OnePlus Nord N20 teaser shows off new design, confirms 60Hz AMOLED display and April launch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus has released the first teaser for the OnePlus Nord N20, showing off its design, display, and confirming an April release date.
